Package edu.hogwarts.studentadmin.controller

Class HogwartsPersonController<M extends HogwartsPerson,D extends HogwartsPersonDTO,S extends HogwartsPersonService<M,D>>

java.lang.Object
edu.hogwarts.studentadmin.controller.HogwartsPersonController<M,D,S>
Type Parameters:
M - The type of HogwartsPerson (Student | Teacher).
D - The DTO for the HogwartsPerson (StudentDTO | TeacherDTO).
S - The service for the HogwartsPerson (StudentService | TeacherService).
Direct Known Subclasses:
StudentController, TeacherController
public abstract class HogwartsPersonController<M extends HogwartsPerson,D extends HogwartsPersonDTO,S extends HogwartsPersonService<M,D>> extends Object
Controller superclass for HogwartsPerson entities.

      @GetMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<D> get(@PathVariable("id") Long id)
      Handle HTTP GET requests for the /{id} endpoint. Gets a HogwartsPerson entity by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the HogwartsPerson entity.
      Returns:
      An HTTP response with the HogwartsPerson entity or 404 not found if it does not exist.

      @PostMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<D> create(@RequestBody D person)
      Handle HTTP POST requests for the / endpoint. Creates a new HogwartsPerson entity from the request body.
      Parameters:
      person - The HogwartsPerson entity to create.
      Returns:
      An HTTP response with the created HogwartsPerson entity.

    • update

      @PutMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<D> update(@RequestBody D person, @PathVariable("id") Long id)
      Handle HTTP PUT requests for the /{id} endpoint. Updates a HogwartsPerson entity by its ID with the request body.
      Parameters:
      person - The updated HogwartsPerson entity.
      id - The ID of the HogwartsPerson entity to update.
      Returns:
      An HTTP response with the updated HogwartsPerson entity or 404 not found if it does not exist.

    • patch

      @PatchMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<D> patch(@RequestBody D person, @PathVariable("id") Long id)
      Handle HTTP PATCH requests for the /{id} endpoint. Patch a HogwartsPerson entity by its ID with the request body. Only updates the fields present in the request body.
      Parameters:
      person - The updated HogwartsPerson entity.
      id - The ID of the HogwartsPerson entity to patch.
      Returns:
      An HTTP response with the patched HogwartsPerson entity or 404 not found if it does not exist.

    • delete

      @DeleteMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<D> delete(@PathVariable("id") Long id)
      Handle HTTP DELETE requests for the /{id} endpoint. Delete a HogwartsPerson entity by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the HogwartsPerson entity to delete.
      Returns:
      An HTTP response with the deleted HogwartsPerson entity or 404 not found if it does not exist.
